history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_plus. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_plus. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_plus,ex_lim_opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_plus,ex_lim_opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_plus,ex_lim_opp.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_lim_plus with (g := fun y => - g y).
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x, lf : Rbar Hlf : is_lim f x lf lg : Rbar Hlg : is_lim g x lg Hminus : ex_Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => ?M2373 y + - g y) ?M2375 l" with "Lim (fun y : R => f y - g y) x = Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x)".

In environment H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x -> ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) -> ex_lim (fun y : R => f y + g y) x f, g : R -> R x, lf : Rbar Hlf : is_lim f x lf lg : Rbar Hlg : is_lim g x lg Hminus : ex_Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) Unable to unify "is_lim f x lf" with "Lim (fun y : R => f y - g y) x = Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x)".

In environment H0 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x -> ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) -> ex_lim (fun y : R => f y + g y) x f, g : R -> R x, lf : Rbar Hlf : is_lim f x lf lg : Rbar Hlg : is_lim g x lg Hminus : ex_Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => - ?M3153 y) ?M3154 l" with "Lim (fun y : R => f y - g y) x = Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x)".

In environment H1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim (fun y : R => - f y) x H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x -> ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) -> ex_lim (fun y : R => f y + g y) x f, g : R -> R x, lf : Rbar Hlf : is_lim f x lf lg : Rbar Hlg : is_lim g x lg Hminus : ex_Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) Unable to unify "is_lim g x lg" with "Lim (fun y : R => f y - g y) x = Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x)".

In environment H2 : forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim (fun y : R => - f y) x H0 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x -> ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Lim g x) -> ex_lim (fun y : R => f y + g y) x f, g : R -> R x, lf : Rbar Hlf : is_lim f x lf lg : Rbar Hlg : is_lim g x lg Hminus : ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Rbar_opp (Lim g x)) Unable to unify "ex_Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Rbar_opp (Lim g x))" with "Lim (fun y : R => f y - g y) x = Rbar_minus (Lim f x) (Lim g x)".

original: intros [lf Hlf] [lg Hlg] Hminus. apply ex_lim_plus with (g := fun y => - g y). - apply Hlf. - apply ex_lim_opp. apply Hlg. - unfold ex_Rbar_minus in Hminus. apply Hminus.
